room_title: Escape room "Dead Man's Chest" by Epic Team Adventures in Seattle
review: Went with our family we did the Davey Jones treasure chest one. The hour flew by, super fun- definitely makes you think as it's all based around mind puzzles. Very helpful staff, could see when we needed help and stepped in with direction. Highly recommend!!!

room_title: Escape room "Dead Man's Chest" by Epic Team Adventures in Seattle
review: If you like challenging escape rooms, Epic Team Adventures is a place to check out. It is located in an office building and can be a little difficult to find.We did the Pirate Adventure which is designed for larger groups. It is difficult to write too much of a review without giving too much away.I think this is probably better with groups of friends, but OK to do alone. It is definitely worth a visit.

room_title: Escape room "Dead Man's Chest" by Epic Team Adventures in Seattle
review: I've done 3 different rooms with Epic Team Adventures. I believe the puzzle quality is great, the production is amazing and it was a really good time each time.
